snippet.title: Matell Intellivision Game:  NFL Football (1978 Mattel Electronics)
snippet.description: A sports containing almost all real elements of football such as four quarters, fifteen minutes each. There are four difficulty levels; high school, college, semi-pro, and pro. There are nine different plays to call, including running plays, field goals, passing plays, and punting. The only thing that's not realistic about NFL Football is the teams only have five players on offense and on defense.
